amendment.description: Amendment provides $10 million to support the Marine Corps Wounded Warrior Regiment program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 110-78 to direct the Secretary of Defense to ensure that $10,000,000 is directed to support programs, activities, and facilities associated with the Marine Corps Wounded Warrior Regiment program from the Medical Support Fund created by this bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kline (MN) amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
